title: The Most Sublime Goal of Human Life | @ChanchalapathiDas
speaker: HG Chanchalapathi Dasa

segments.text: we must have a mission in our life so you should be preoccupied there must be something very
exalted in your life that you are pursuing that's what gives meaning to your life otherwise life
is miserable i was reading one australian psychologist he says when you get up in the
morning that exalted thing that you are pursuing in life should be the foremost thing that comes
to your mind and that energizes you wow let me get up and do the work very culture tells us
that the most exalted thing in human life that we should all be doing is self-realization there
are different grades of self-realization and then there is the highest level of self-realization
and that is awakening our own relationship with the lord that should be the dominant thing in our
life when we wake up in the morning we are in the morning we are in the morning we are in the
the morning. That should come to our mind. Prabhupada wants us to pursue very sublime,
very noble, very exalted goal that is love of Krishna.
